Lin Shuyun

Korean: 린 슈윤

Introduction

Lin Shuyun (린슈윈) is a Taiwanese trainee signed with TPOP Entertainment. She was a participant in the hit Korean survival show, Girls Planet 999 and the Taiwanese survival show NEXT GIRLZ.
